lines:
Rear Sup Imed College 
956 uit China,

11

1910

el karus Egri

tam

Deartir

hat I beg to achurulidze

your Mind liter q hov last 
meluding sabut g accus 
ony Lou ss. Keda Jane 
really widebted to your Huid 
herible a to have my Perić 
libret at heart tronds 
can not express my feeling 
and I will ut atempt it 
will my words.

I Kasten to forward 
you with a cheque for 1600 
six hundred dollari gold to
raw: Rear Sup Imed College 956 uit China, 11 1910 el karus Egri tam Deartir hat I beg to achurulidze your Mind liter q hov last meluding sabut g accus ony Lou ss. Keda Jane really widebted to your Huid herible a to have my Perić libret at heart tronds can not express my feeling and I will ut atempt it will my words. I Kasten to forward you with a cheque for 1600 six hundred dollari gold to

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter thanking Stearns for the statements of account for his son. He encloses $600 to apply to the account and apologizes for the delay, due to his travel in Europe. Kwan hopes to see Stearns when he comes to the U.S. for a meeting with the Chinese Naval Commissioners.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
